entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
